MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType FindEntityType (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel model, Type type);
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType FindEntityType(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel model, class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The model to find the entity type in.
The type to find the corresponding entity type for.
Docs.summary: Gets the entity that maps the given entity class. Returns null if no entity type with the given name is found or the entity type has a defining navigation.
Docs.returns: The entity type, or null if none if found.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType FindEntityType (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel model, Type type, string definingNavigationName, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType definingEntityType);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType FindEntityType(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel model, class System.Type type, string definingNavigationName, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType definingEntityType) cil managed

Docs.param: The model to find the entity type in.
The type of the entity type to find.
The defining navigation of the entity type to find.
The defining entity type of the entity type to find.
Docs.summary: Gets the entity type for the given type, defining navigation name and the defining entity type. Returns null if no matching entity type is found.
Docs.returns: The entity type, or null if none are found.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTrackingStrategy GetChangeTrackingStrategy (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel model);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTrackingStrategy GetChangeTrackingStrategy(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel model) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function GetChangeTrackingStrategy (model As IModel) As ChangeTrackingStrategy

Docs.param: The model to get the default change tracking strategy for.
Docs.summary: Gets the default change tracking strategy being used for entities in the model. This strategy indicates how the context detects changes to properties for an instance of an entity type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Nullable<Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.PropertyAccessMode> GetPropertyAccessMode (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel model);

.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.PropertyAccessMode> GetPropertyAccessMode(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel model) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function GetPropertyAccessMode (model As IModel) As Nullable(Of PropertyAccessMode)

Docs.param: The model to get the access mode for.

summary.para: Gets the being used for properties of entity types in this model. Null indicates that the default property access mode is being used.

Note that individual entity types can override this access mode, and individual properties of entity types can override the access mode set on the entity type. The value returned here will be used for any property for which no override has been specified.

Docs.returns: The access mode being used, or null if the default access mode is being used.
